At Ripple, weâ€™re building a world where value moves like information does today. Itâ€™s big, itâ€™s bold, and weâ€™re already doing it. Through our crypto solutions for financial institutions, businesses, governments and developers, we are improving the global financial system and creating greater economic fairness and opportunity for more people, in more places around the world. And we get to do the best work of our career and grow our skills surrounded by colleagues who have our backs. 
If youâ€™re ready to see your impact and unlock incredible career growth opportunities, join us, and build real world value.THE WORK:
We are seeking a DevOps Engineer to join our Engineering team in Lausanne.
WHAT YOUâ€™LL DO:
Work with the development team to package and deliver our software solution,
Establish and maintain automated CI/CD pipelines for blockchain applications,
Conduct thorough testing of our SaaS solution components and deploy updates securely,
Implement robust security measures to safeguard the SaaS product from potential vulnerabilities and attacks,
Develop and maintain automation scripts and tools for efficient management of our SaaS infrastructure,
Utilize infrastructure-as-code (IaC) principles to manage resources effectively,
Monitor blockchain performance metrics and proactively optimize for improved speed and efficiency,
Conduct load testing and analysis to identify and resolve bottlenecks,
Lead and mentor junior DevOps team members with a focus on blockchain technologies,
Collaborate closely with blockchain developers, researchers, and stakeholders to align infrastructure requirements with development goals.
WHAT WEâ€™RE LOOKING FOR:
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field (or equivalent work experience),
Proven experience as a DevOps Engineer in a blockchain-focused environment, with a minimum of 5 years of experience,
Experience with decentralized protocols, consensus algorithms, and smart contract development,
Hands-on experience with CI/CD tools like GitLab CI/CD or similar,
Proficiency in scripting languages like Bash, Go, Terraform or DotNet,
Knowledge of containerization technologies like Docker and orchestration tools like Kubernetes,
Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to troubleshoot complex blockchain issues,
Excellent communication and teamwork skills to collaborate effectively within a startup environment.
WHO WE ARE:
Do Your Best Work
The opportunity to build in a fast-paced start-up environment with experienced industry leaders
A learning environment where you can dive deep into the latest technologies and make an impact.  A professional development budget to support other modes of learning.
Thrive in an environment where no matter what race, ethnicity, gender, origin, or culture they identify with, every employee is a respected, valued, and empowered part of the team.
Ripple is Flexible First: you have the option to work from home, from our offices, or a combination of the two around our centers of gravity (15 global offices).
Weekly all-company meeting - business updates and ask me anything style discussion with our Leadership Team
We come together for moments that matter which include team offsites, team bonding activities, happy hours and more!
Take Control of Your Finances
Competitive salary, bonuses, and equity
Competitive benefits that cover physical and mental healthcare, retirement, family forming, and family support
Employee giving match
Mobile phone stipend
Take Care of Yourself
Twice a quarter R&R days so you can rest and recharge
Generous wellness reimbursement and weekly onsite & virtual programming
Generous vacation policy - work with your manager to take time off when you need it
Industry-leading parental leave policies. Family planning benefits.
Catered lunches, fully-stocked kitchens with premium snacks/beverages, and plenty of fun events
Benefits listed above are for full-time Ripple employees. For all Metaco roles, please discuss benefits with your recruiter.
